review_blob: Draft pitch dark black with almost no head. The aroma is amazing, vanilla chocolate very mellow. You can really taste the bourbon. Incredible how a 14.2% passes like silk through my throat. 2014 edition
Easy to drink. Not to dry more on the sweet side with some chocolate notes. Well balanced.
On tap. Serious Black IPA. Fantastic appearence and fantastic aroma. I absolutly going to drink more of this.

Not really showcasing any flavor nor any aspect of a summer ale. I think the brewer wanted to make something drinkable with some flavor but too simple. Not something I would try to find again but will drink it if offered.

Drinking this draft, the appearance was excellent, very well carb and a clear golden color. Smell was citrusy but nothing really highlight an essential fruit. I think the ibus overpower any fruit taste other than hops. Overall good IPA.

En Botella. Un clsico perfecto de su estilo. Esm vaso dorado turbio de buen brillo, y buena corona blanca. Aroma hierba, trigo, pltano, algo de especies. Muy rica y agradable y no falla, pero si te gusta sta, debes probar. La Vitus que es an mejor.
On tap at Biercap. Negra con una pequea corona marrn. Algo de lacing. Balanceada, chocolate, maltas tostadas, sedosa. Muy agradable sin embargo no espectacular.
From bottle to glass. Deep amber color with white persistent head. Full body with fragrant aromas, just the right amount of bitterness with a fruit delightful finish
Bottle. Is an english pale ale, so is more malty than hoppy. Nice beer, very balanced. I can drink this again.
Bottle. Clear yellow with small white head. A little citirc aroma and taste, low bitterness. Too much watery for my taste.
Bottle. Nice black ale. Dark black with beige head. Rosated malts, chocolate, nice bittenrness and very balanced. Nice sorprise! Ill repeat this again.
Pours a nice copper to brownish color. big frothy head thats stays for a long time. Smell like tea, very malty and with a Suttle feel as a Weis. The Chai and berries gives it a nice touch.

On tap en OMA Bistr. Color cobre con una buen corona blanca y buen lacing. Aromas herbales y frutales. En paladar es seca de amargor medio alto. Fresca y con un largo y buen aftertaste. Curiosa lager de cuerpo medio y carbonatcin medio alta. Con ganas de otra!!!
beer_name: Bidassoa / Drunken Bros / Gross / La Quince Hop Hunters Winter IPL

review_blob: Bottle. Dark yellow and a nice head. Fantastic aroma and taste. You can really notice the apricot and the mango. Perfect bitter and silky hoppy feeling. Need more of these.
On tap. Fantastic brew, even as barley wine or double ipa. Almost black with a foamy tan head. Spicy, hops, nice bitterness. Almost dont feel the high ABV it has. Really tasty and I can repeat gladly
En botella. Color amarillo palido con corona blanca, persistente. Fresca, hierba, algo de flores y lpulos. suave y bien balanceada en amargor y dulzor. Cuerpo ligero de carbonatacin media. Agradable
Bottle. Pours dark yellow with a big bubblelin head. Is surprisly ok. Crispy with high corbonation. Earthy and yeasty. Not a fan but I guess is a fantastic gluten free beer. Well done
Bottl. Pours bright gold. A lot of exotic fruits aroma, mango, passion fruits, citrus and pine. Taste hoppy with a lot of fruit, and a nice dry. Not a fan but it was great beer to tried.
On tap at the brewery. Clear dark gold with a thin head. Yeasty, sweet and crispy, with a nice bitter finish. first beer in this style. Nice one and cool tap room
Bottle. Black beauty with a creamy beige head. Vanilla chocolate and is so rounded, silky and creamy. Hasnt try a sweet stout like this before. Just lovely.
I really enjoy this Scottish heavy for the price that is available. Very complex with lots of toffee, fruit and malt flavors
Bottle. Gold with a small whie head. A nice lager. A little hoppy, malty cris, fresh lager. Really drnkable beer
750 ml. Bottle. Nice dark winter warmer. Pours dark brown with light brown head. Roaste malts, caramel, alcoholic, thick body, frits, yeasty. Nice bitter/ sweet flavour. Really nice beer!
750 ml. Bottle. Brown colour with a nice creamy white head. Aroma is caramel and fruity, roasty maltiness with some spices. Fruity and malty with caramel, plums and raisins aroma and taste. Ok

75cl bottle. Wow! This is fantastic seasonal strong belgian beer. Dark brown pour with a thin tan head. Sweet malty aromas with dried fruit, spices. Sweet flavors of brown sugar. I know what Im buying next Crhistmas
So far one of my favorites sours, the Belgian strong brown ale comes out nicely. Very earthy with the right mount of sourness and acidity
This one was too funky for my taste! Lots of Hay and yeast, the brandy comes out real nice and the appearance and aroma of this beer was excellent
Hazy light yellow beer, light aromas of apple and yeast, very light with a lot of carbonation. Very drinkable
beer_name: Jester King Le Petit Prince Farmhouse Table Beer (Batch 11+)

review_blob: On tap at la maison belgue. Brown with a thick off-white head. Aroma is a yeasty, sweet malty. Flavor is a rich caramel with a maybe too high alcoholic for my taste, balanced by an earthy sweetness. Nice warmer beer, but not my fave quad.
Bottle. Amber color with a white head. Hoppy crispy and fresh amber ale. Caramel notes and nnice malt amount. Not a fan of this one, but is ok.

Bottle on caliz. This is just a fantastic dubbel. Brown dark with a fantastic beige head. Malty, fruity, earty aroma with a nice sweet taste. Full body, creamy and thick with a long finish. Allways a pleasure!
On tap at Brewdog Barcelona - bamber dark pour with white head. Aroma and taste is citrus fruity, and medium malty, some caramel biscuit malty, good bitter finish. Great DIPA.
En botella. De color rojizo con pequea corona blanca. Aroma y sabor balanceado, equilibrado amargor y dulzor. Muy fresca y fcil de beber. Me podra tomar varias de stas sin problema.

Naranja claro con una pequea corona blanca y un fantstico lacing. Aroma a frutas tropicales, caramelo, citrico y lpulo fresco. Igual en boca con un amargor agradable, y aftertaste medio. Muy agradable y fresca APA. Para tomarse varias sin problema.
En botella en OMA Bistr. Negra con una cremosa y duradera cabeza marrn. Buena apariencia con aroma a licor, chocolate, maltas tostadas, igual que en sabor, con cuerpo denso. Es fantstica! Repetir
Ambar con media corona blanquecina. Floral, notas afrutados, ctricos y algo de especias. Acidez baja y carbonatacin media. Cuerpo ligero. Refrescante y agradable.
En botella hace ms de un ao y estaba mala. Termin en el desage. La probar nuevamente en un futuro.
Botella 50cl. Marrn turbio con una pequea cabeza. Frutas, maltas, pino y madera. Compleja en gusto, con acidez agradable, cuerpo ligero. Madera, tierra, dtiles. Carbonatacin media alta. Agradable

Bottle at OMA Bistr. I really like this IPA. Great dark amber color with a nice head and lacing. Nice pine, citrus, hoppy aroma and flavour. Well balanced with a nice refreshing and bitter at the end. I usually buy some of these for my house. Need to try this someday.
Bottle at OMA Bistro. Amber color with nice head and great lacing. Earthy, pine, caramel and hoppy flavour and taste. Really nice Red IPA that you have to try sometime.
On tap at Biercab. Clear orange color whith nice white head and nice lacing. Cirtus and pine aroma and flavor. Very balnaced beer. Really fresh. A nice IPA.

On tap at biercab. Golden color with a creamy white head. Pine, resinous aroma with some tropical fruits. Flavor is nice, fresh and hoppy with some sweetness at first and great bitter at the end and aftertaste. Very enjoyable IIPA and glad to try good stuff from California, here in Barcelona.
This is how a good triple should taste like! Colour appearance smell palate, I cant say enough about it. Excellent body with lingering aftertaste.

Cervezn cargado de lpulo. Pino, aromas ctricos algo dulce. Cuerpo medio, resinosa, mucho lpulo, melocotn, pino, amargor perfecto. Muy sabrosa. Repetira y con ganas de probar las que faltan de la serie.
En botella. Amarillo turbio, con espuma blnca. Hierba fresca, algo de fruta. Seca, carbonatacin medio alta. Muy agradable
Typical pale lager, that you drink in caribbean countries. This is just for refreshing from the hot weather. Ok I guess
Nothing to say about this beet. Im just filling this for the record. This is jus water flavored.
En botella. Es como beber una malta. Es una cerveza maltosa con mucho dulzor.
On tap at Biercab. Fantstica IPA. Todas las caractersticas que buscas en una IPA. Muy recomendable.

On tap at OMA Bistr. Negra con una pequea corona marrn. Muy aromtica a maltas tostadas, chocolate. En paladar es compleja, persistente el tostado, chocolate, algo de licor, banana. Dominan las maltas sobre el lpulo. Largo aftertate.
